snippet: If Tuesday’s debate is seen as a draw, the winner will be decided in the hours and days after, with perceptions shaped by whichever campaign manages the aftermath more effectively.
abstract: Caucus column; list of five tips for the presidential campaigns to following in the critical task of managing post-debate public perceptions.
lead_paragraph: If Tuesday’s debate is seen as a draw, the winner will be decided in the hours and days after, with perceptions shaped by whichever campaign manages the aftermath more effectively.

headline.seo: 5 Tips for the Presidential Campaigns After Tuesday’s Debate
headline.main:
Most Crucial Time
for Candidates May
Be After the Debate
headline.print_headline: Five Tips for the Presidential Campaigns After Tuesday’s Debate
